|- wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2))), wa(wss(c1, c3), wss(c3, c4))), wcel(c3, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), c2)))
-| wceq(c4, cuni(c0))

comment: Any subset ` M ` of ` X ` containing a neighborhood ` N ` of a set ` S ` is a neighborhood of this set. Generalization to subsets of Property V_i of [BourbakiTop1] p. I.3. (Contributed by FL, 2-Oct-2006.)
